metadata.feature_description: Retrieve list of pages with filtering by parent ID and search key

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify empty parent returns root pages

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Pages panel displays with list of root-level pages
steps.actual: Pages panel opened showing root pages: Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, News, Community, Search Results, 404 Error Page, Wiki Test, Groups

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Get pages by parent ID (expand parent)

steps.action: Click expand icon [+] on Home page to show children
steps.expected: Child pages of Home should be displayed
steps.actual: Home page expanded showing child pages: Activities, Badges, Leaderboard. Toggle changed from [EXPAND ALL] to [COLLAPSE ALL]

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages with exact search key

steps.action: Enter 'News' in the search box and submit
steps.expected: Search results should show pages matching 'News'
steps.actual: Page Search Results displayed showing '1 PAGE FOUND' - the News page with details: Page Type: Standard, Publish Status: Published, Publish Date: 02/09/2026, Workflow: Direct Publish

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages with partial search key

steps.action: Enter 'Com' in the search box and submit
steps.expected: Search results should show pages containing 'Com' (case-insensitive partial match)
steps.actual: Search returned '1 PAGE FOUND' - Community page was found matching partial search 'Com'

steps.action: Enter '404' in the search box and submit
steps.expected: Search results should show pages containing '404'
steps.actual: Search returned '1 PAGE FOUND' - 404 Error Page was found matching numeric search '404'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages with special characters (XSS test)

steps.action: Enter '<script>alert('xss')</script>' in the search box and submit
steps.expected: Search should handle special characters safely without XSS vulnerability
steps.actual: Search returned 'NO PAGE FOUND.' - Special characters were handled safely, displayed as plain text in search box, no script execution occurred

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages with empty input returns all pages

steps.action: Clear search box and view results
steps.expected: Empty search should return all pages
steps.actual: Page Search Results displayed showing '30 PAGES FOUND' - all pages in the site were returned when search was empty

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Advanced Filters - Filter by Publish Status

steps.expected: Advanced Filters panel should show filtering options
steps.actual: Advanced Filters panel expanded showing: Filter by Page Type, Filter by Publish Status, Filter by Published Date Range, Filter by Workflow, and Tag Filters

steps.action: Select 'Draft' from Filter by Publish Status dropdown and click Apply
steps.expected: Search results should be filtered to show only draft pages
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully - '1 PAGE FOUND' showing only Wiki Test page with Publish Status: Draft

observations: The GetPageList API uses parentId=-1 as default to return root pages, which works correctly via the UI

The SearchPages API supports multiple filter parameters (searchKey, pageType, tags, publishStatus, publishDateStart, publishDateEnd, workflowId, pageIndex, pageSize) which are exposed through the Advanced Filters UI
The page tree view on the left side allows expanding/collapsing to view child pages, which corresponds to the GetPageList parentId functionality
Search is case-insensitive and supports partial matching on TabName and LocalizedTabName
Permission-based filtering is handled at the API level (VIEW_PAGE_LIST, VIEW permissions required) - as superuser, all pages are visible
Pagination parameters (pageIndex, pageSize) are available in the API but the UI displays all results by default (30 pages shown)
